distribution system where members take turns receiving pool funds  How it works: - Fixed number of members commit to regular contributions - Each period (month), one member receives the total pool - Order is predetermined at pool creation - Meanwhile, funds generate DeFi yields - Extra yields are distributed at the end  Benefits: - Traditional ROSCA + DeFi yields - Predictable payout schedule - Community trust + smart contract security - Last members benefit from accumulated yields  Example: - 12 members, 0.01 BTC/month contribution - Month 1: Member 1 receives 0.12 BTC - Month 2: Member 2 receives 0.12 BTC - ...plus accumulated yields - Month 12: Member 12 receives 0.12 BTC + all accumulated yields","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is advancePeriod(uint256).details: FIX H-03: Added access control - only pool members or after period elapsed

claimPayout(uint256).details: CEI PATTERN: State updates BEFORE external transfers      H-02 FIX: noFlashLoan prevents same-block deposit+claim

claimRefund(uint256).details: FIX H-01: Allows members to claim refunds when pool is cancelled      Uses CEI pattern: state updates BEFORE external transfers

getPendingYield(uint256).details: poolId is reserved for future per-pool yield tracking

makeContribution(uint256).details: CEI PATTERN: State updates BEFORE external calls where possible

makeContributionNative(uint256).details: UX IMPROVEMENT: Accepts native BTC for better user experience      No approval needed - just send BTC with the transaction

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

depositBlock(address).notice: H-02 FIX: Block-based flash loan protection

getMemberAtIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Get member at specific index in payout order

getPoolMembers(uint256).notice: Get all members of a pool

hasClaimedRefund(uint256,address).notice: H-01 FIX: Track refunds for cancelled pools

makeContribution(uint256).notice: Make contribution for current period using WBTC

makeContributionNative(uint256).notice: Make contribution for current period using native BTC

membersWithPayoutCount(uint256).notice: M-04 FIX: Gas optimization - track members with payouts

periodContributions(uint256,uint256).notice: M-04 FIX: Gas optimization - track contributions per period

poolMemberOrder(uint256,uint256).notice: Pool ID => Member Index => Member Address

poolMembers(uint256,address).notice: Pool ID => Member Address => Member Info

poolPeriods(uint256,uint256).notice: Pool ID => Period Number => Period Info
